flowRoot.flowPara: USE THE POWER MANAGEMENT BUTTONS ON THE RIGHT TO INCREASE
POWER TO SUBSYSTEMS. THERE IS ONLY A LIMITED AMOUNT OF POWER
> SENSORS ALLOW THE WEAPONS TO TARGET QUICKER
> WEAPONS WILL ALLOW THE BEAM AND DECOYS TO WORK
> ENGINES CHANGES THE SHIPS ROTATION AND TOP SPEED
> INTERNAL SYSTEMS KEEPS THE OXYGEN FLOWING AND LIGHTS ON
